name: King's Lair
description:
King's Lair is a stealth based folk-horror game with puzzle elements. There is no combat and you must rely on your wit and composure to prevail.

You play as a desperate explorer who is investigating a new lead overheard in town, claiming that fresh gold has been found flowing through an abandoned mine due to an unusual amount of rainfall.

You start the game just as your character has finished climbing over a security fence into the restricted private property, equipped with a Flashlight and Gold Pan.
